commands.label: Run npm tests
commands.description: Run VS Code extension tests (npm test)

commands.label: Run Python tests
commands.command: cd python; python -m unittest discover flowchart.tests -v

commands.label: Run All UI Tests
commands.description: Run all UI tests for the extension

commands.label: Run Subgraph Collapse/Expand Test
commands.description: Run the subgraph collapse/expand UI test
commands.command: npm run compile; if ($?) { npx extest run-tests out/ui-test/subgraph-collapse-expand.ui.test.js --code_version 1.105.1 --code_settings ui-test/settings.json --storage .vscode-test --offline --log_level Error }
